Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial broad clue collection with no specific hypothesis
Listing natural elements broadly to gather observational clues
Listing man-made features broadly to gather observational clues
Broad hypothesis generation about temperate zone and European/North American park design
Broad conclusion and consideration of divergent next steps after failed verification

Verification inconclusive, returning to broad exploration
